channel.title: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?
channel.description:
I Seem to get bored of games quite quickly. I havent found a game that has suited me.
[url=http://play-free-online-games.com/games/games_all.html]http://play-free-online-games.com/games/games_all.html[/url]
I have played nearly every game on this list. Do you guys know of any other lists of games like this?

item.title: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You can download iWin, they have tons of downloadable games.

Read full topic
item.source: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?

item.title: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:1, topic:246468”]I Seem to get bored of games quite quickly. I havent found a game that has suited me.

http://play-free-online-games.com/games/games_all.html

I have played nearly every game on this list. Do you guys know of any other lists of games like this?[/quote]
That list is outdated, Blockland isn’t free anymore.
Also, afaik Darkfall isn’t free to play.
On topic, three great games you should try:
Dark and Shattered Lands (although I haven’t played in a while because I got pissed off when the last time I died I couldn’t find my body and lost all my gear… hopefully not my gold I’ll have to check)
Shaiya (I was pretty sure it was going to suck when I tried it but it’s actually pretty cool and you can’t beat the price)
Battlefield-Heroes (I’m assuming this game will be awesome)
DSL time.

Read full topic

item.title: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:246468”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=322941.msg2658237#msg2658237 date=1234015660]

Personally, I love this one:

http://www.nexuiz.com/

It is awesome.

I’m thinking they got all their ideas from halo. :rolleyes:

I see why you love it…

Nexuiz is a free open-source first person shooter that runs on Windows, Linux and OSX.

[/quote]

I believe it was around before Halo. And it’s better than Halo :P[/quote]
lol i’ve never met another nex player ive been playing it for ages epic games are epic

Read full topic

item.title: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:246468”]Personally, I love this one:

nexuiz.com

Nexuiz

Nexuiz is an extremely competitive fast paced Arena First Person shooter for Xbox 360 and PC via XBLA & Steam. Nexuiz is powered by CryENGINE3.

It is awesome.[/quote]
I got it, it’s like a free Unreal Tournament

Pretty fun actually.

Read full topic

item.title: Any body know of a List of free downloadable games?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“chrham2, post:6, topic:246468”]Or torrent some games… http://mininova.org
& utorrent.com

You can have example: Free GTA IV, free GTA:SA or free CS, and its FREE to register, no virus and a clean page Always remember to use those with most seeds.

If 0 seeds, don’t even bother download it… oh, now my GTA IV is done :D[/quote]
I felt like GTA 4 was…empty?
